list_definition.mean_english: truyện kinh dị, truyện trinh thám
list_definition.definition: an exciting novel or play, usually about crime, detectives etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I always take a thriller to read on the train.

list_ex_of_english: I believe that that is a fiction, from the imagination of thriller writers.
In light reading, crime novels, thrillers, westerns and romances dominate, as would be expected.
It's a good building for a thriller.
There were certainly more royalties paid out for the thrillers.
He would find it difficult to write a thriller more amazing than the events of the last few months.
A careful examination of the record makes revealing and fascinating reading and would be great source material for a good thriller or perhaps, more accurately, a whodunnit.
Why not get some of the spacemen thriller writers to recruit some of the children for science?
Does anybody here want to read a thriller this week-end?
